title: Richard B. Spencer
summary: Richard Bertrand Spencer (born May 1978)[1] is an American neo-Nazi,[2][3] antisemitic conspiracy theorist, and white supremacist public speaker and former editor who is known for his activism on behalf of the alt-right movement.[2][4] He advocates for the reconstitution of the European Union into a White racial empire, which he believes will replace the diverse European ethnic identities with one homogeneous "White identity".[5][6][7]
